thread.title: Xbox Games with Gold March lineup includes Evolve
thread.title_full: Xbox Games with Gold March lineup includes Evolve

title: Xbox Games with Gold March lineup includes Evolve
text:
Xbox Games with Gold March lineup includes Evolve Borderlands 2! Layers of Fear! More! By Wesley Yin-Poole Published 22/02/2017 
Microsoft's announced March 2017's Xbox Live Games with Gold titles, and it's a decent lineup. 
Headlining is Turtle Rock's 4v1 shooter Evolve: Ultimate Edition on Xbox One (16th March). Also on Xbox One is horror game Layers of Fear (1st March). 
Xbox 360 owners get Borderlands 2, followed by PopCap's 2008 XBLA game Heavy Weapon. Both are playable on Xbox One via the Backward Compatibility feature. Games featured in this article
